From: Sabitha Menon <Sabitha.Menon@chalhoub.com <mailto:Sabitha.Menon@chalhoub.com> > 
Sent: Thursday, 23 January 2025 11:01 AM
Subject: RE: 1 week to go - Your Voice Matters: Participate in Our Voice of the People Survey!

 

Dear team,

 

Good day!

 

Thank you to those who took the time to complete the Voice of the People survey. 

 

For those who haven’t had the chance to complete the survey yet, please find the link below. With one more week to go before closure of the survey, we encourage you to complete the survey as soon as possible. Your input is invaluable in helping us understand what we’re doing well and where we can improve. By completing this survey, you contribute to making our organization a great place to work where everyone can thrive.

From: Sabitha Menon <Sabitha.Menon@chalhoub.com <mailto:Sabitha.Menon@chalhoub.com> > 
Sent: Tuesday, 14 January 2025 4:56 PM
Subject: Launching 15 Jan '25 - Your Voice Matters: Participate in Our Voice of the People Survey!

 

Dear Team,

 

We are excited to announce that we will be launching our Voice of People Survey tomorrow, 15 Jan! 

 

Why Participate? Your input is invaluable in helping us understand what we’re doing well and where we can improve. By completing this survey, you contribute to making our organization a great place to work where everyone can thrive.

 

We encourage you not to wait until the last minute to complete the survey. Early participation helps us gauge response trends and ensures your voice is heard in time.

 

Key Details:

*	Survey Timeline: January 15 - 31
*	Time to Complete: Approximately 12 mins

 

Additionally, we will be hosting a series of virtual roadshows to provide more information about the survey and address any questions you may have. Stay tuned for the schedule, which we’ll share soon!

 

Thank you in advance for taking the time to contribute. Together, we can make a meaningful impact.

 

Kind regards,

SABITHA MENON​​​​

PEOPLE PARTNER

REAL FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

		
 

 <https://chalhoubgroup.com/> 

CHALHOUBGROUP.COM <http://www.chalhoubgroup.com/> 

‑
